Description_lang: King Rastakhan channels fire at an enemy, inflicting $s1 Fire damage every $t1 sec for $d. When the channel ends the target explodes, inflicting $284846s1 Fire damage to all enemies. This damage is decreased the farther the main target is from King Rastakhan.
AuraDescription_lang: $s1 Fire damage inflicted every $t1 sec.Explodes on aura expiration for up to $284846s1 Fire damage.
